name: @yoskutik/mobx-form-schema-monorepo
description: The simple way to organize you forms!

scripts.pub: yarn build && yarn test && yarn test:coverage && yarn --cwd packages/manual-form-schema pub --no-git-tag-version && yarn --cwd packages/mobx-form-schema pub && cp packages/mobx-form-schema/README.md README.md
scripts.build: yarn --cwd packages/manual-form-schema build && yarn --cwd packages/mobx-form-schema build && yarn --cwd packages/docs build

author: Yoskutik <yoskutik@gmail.com>
